title: Ep 369 | Miss Kay's Stunning Recovery from Her Severe Lip Injury & Why Lisa Felt Unworthy as a Wife
description:
Miss Kay is back with an update on how she's doing after her dog bit a big chunk out of her lip. Al relives a traumatic experience involving a family member and a bathtub. Kay and Phil tell a story about Willie cutting down a tree she loved. Lisa and Kay reject Phil's title suggestion for their upcoming book. Lisa shares why she believed she wasn't worthy of being a preacher's wife. And Kay looks back at her fear of public speaking and how one woman made her realize she had a story to tell.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
